mapper.insert:
delete from DEPLOY_MANAGER where id in
#{ids}
mapper.select: SELECT ID id,VERSION version,CN_NAME cnName,EN_NAME enName,DESCRIPTION description,FILE_PATH filePath,DEPLOY_ID deployId,DEPLOY_VERSION deployVersion,CREATE_DATE createDate,CREATE_BY createBy,UPDATE_BY updateBy,UPDATE_DATE updateDate,STATUS status FROM DEPLOY_MANAGER ORDER BY createDate DESC

SELECT ID id,VERSION version,CN_NAME cnName,EN_NAME enName,DESCRIPTION description,FILE_PATH filePath,DEPLOY_ID deployId,DEPLOY_VERSION deployVersion,CREATE_DATE createDate,CREATE_BY createBy,UPDATE_BY updateBy,UPDATE_DATE updateDate,STATUS status FROM DEPLOY_MANAGER WHERE 1=1
AND EN_NAME = #{enName}

SELECT ID id,VERSION version,CN_NAME cnName,EN_NAME enName,DESCRIPTION description,FILE_PATH filePath,DEPLOY_ID deployId,DEPLOY_VERSION deployVersion,CREATE_DATE createDate,CREATE_BY createBy,UPDATE_BY updateBy,UPDATE_DATE updateDate,STATUS status FROM DEPLOY_MANAGER WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM DEPLOY_MANAGER ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
